channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-29043|2024-08-03T06:10:58.614Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mask%20passwords%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin 3.0 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Non-Stored Password parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
